SA14knavslou:8: Nś_4 prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃyag yo bhāvayitum icchati /
SA14knavslou:11: punarbhavam iti khyātaṃ pratibhāsopamaṃ hi tat //
SA14knavslou:12: Nś_6_[2] nirmitaṃ nagaraṃ yadvad vilokayati nirmitaḥ /
SA14knavslou:13: tadvat paśyati rūpāṇi karmabhir nirmitaṃ jagat //
SA14knavslou:14: Nś_7_[3] dharmaṃ deśayataḥ śabdā ye kecit śrutigocarāḥ /
SA14knavslou:16: Nś_8_[4] āghrataṃ svāditaṃ tathā spraṣṭaṃ viṣayalālāsaiḥ /
SA14knavslou:17: svapnatulyam idaṃ sarvam upalabdhaṃ na vidyate //
SA14knavslou:18: Nś_9_[5] māyāyantro naro yadvad bhinnāṃ ceṣṭāṃ karoti vai /
SA14knavslou:19: tadvad ceṣṭāṃ karoty eva dehayantro nirātmakaḥ //
SA14knavslou:25: udakacandropamaṃ tad dhi pratyakṣaṃ na vidyate //
SA14knavslou:26: Nś_13_[9] yoginām api yaj jñānaṃ tad apy ākāśalakṣaṇam /
SA14knavslou:27: tasmāj jñānaṃ ca jñeyaṃ ca sarvam ākāśalakṣaṇam //
SA14knavslou:28: Nś_14 iti cintayataḥ tattvaṃ sarvabhāveṣv anāśritam /
